entry.title: Can we add a Condition in PCR rule, PE02 like, 2071 WT should be excluded from EG 3 and ESG A8
entry.content: This is the Current Rule, where all the Employees are getting Pension. 2071 (pension wage type) has to be exluced from employee group 3 and subgroup A8.

entry.title: Re: Supplier specific number range for ERS invoices
entry.content:
Hello Raf,

coming late on this topic : the flow ERS Vendor Invoice Numbering as described by notes 684514 & 571376  +  blog :https://community.sap.com/t5/enterprise-resource-planning-blog-posts-by-members/key-customization-to-enable-vendor-specific-number-range-in-self-billing/ba-p/13247335
works on S4H with BP "instead" of Vendors as well.

The key point is to be able to maintain the field "LFA1-STCD4" with theVendor new numbering group  code defined in number range J_1AOFFDOC « Official Documents ».
To do this, you need to maintain Tax NB 4 in BP - FI supplier role "FLVN00" - for tab Indentification.

For example for a vendor in France : that would be Category Tax "FR4" which will lead to field LFA1-STCD4.
If the Tax Catefory is not present for your country : you are missing BP customizing : please see link https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_S4HANA_ON-PREMISE/74b0b157c81944ffaac6ebc07245b9dc/05a5afc94d844866be6a8a273b6d35f0.html

 

Hope this helps.

Stephane

entry.title: Re: MIGO ITEM ADD NEW FIELD
entry.content: You cannot directly add a field to MIGO item tabs. So what you can do is use BAdI MB_MIGO_BADI to create a custom subscreen at item level. You can choose an existing tab (General/Where/Quantity) or create a new tab. Handle data persistence via append structures or Z-tables.

entry.title: Re: Can we add a Condition in PCR rule, PE02 like, 2071 W...
entry.content: @anandhusapYou can absolutely add a condition to your PCR rule ZPN7 to exclude specific employee subgroups (ESG A8) within an employee group (EG 3) from the pension calculation

entry.title: Re: when i data migration one tenant to other tenant in c...
entry.content: When you migrated user data, the new tenant's identity management system likely recognized the users and automatically provisioned them with single sign-on (SSO) and default roles. This is a common feature in many enterprise applications, where user creation or migration triggers automated provisioning processes to ensure users can log in seamlessly and have the necessary initial access rights. The specific SSO and role assignments are typically determined by the tenant's predefined configuration or the data imported during migration.

entry.title: Re: Client Certificate Authentication in SAP Cloud Integration: Configuration and Best Practices
entry.content:
Hi @AdamCsallokozi , @DavidDomokos 

Thank you for your response.

I was able to import the .pfx file in those SAP systems where SAP_BASIS release version is >= 750.
Now my use case is working perfectly.

I have few questions related to the service Key whose key type is "External Certificate". 

What i understood is keytype "External Certificate" should be chosen when Client gives us the certificate from their side.

In this case, while creating service key,  In External Certificate field, as per my understanding we need to give the Key "(e.g -----BEGIN CERTIFICATE-----MIIHyDCCBrCgAwIB[...]CAq8Tn7kSFDmVnrXe6v8hcQ==-----END CERTIFICATE-----)" and then create the service key.

Additionally, in HTTPS Adapter, we need to change the auth from user role to Client certificate and upload the root certificate which client will provide.

Additionally, assumption would be that the same certificate will be already added in client's SAP system using STRUST.
If not then they should create new Client PSE and then import their own certificate along with the Load balancer certificates which we downloaded from Cloud Integration.

And then we create RFC with the required host and path and then choose the appropriate SSL certificate from the dropdown.

Is my understanding correct?

Regards,

Bishal

entry.title: Re: Plant Address Keeps on Changing Automatically
entry.content:
Hello all,

I also have this phenomenon:

The system change the plant address automatically in a customer address. 

If we correct the plant address via OX10 and transport it to our production system, the plant address will be automatically overwritten (every two/three weeks) from transaction VL09 or VL02N (we saw it on the database). But we don´t find the reason why the system change it automatically. 

Its only for 2 plants - not for all plants. We checked batch jobs, customer-programms, check user behavior and so on. No solution to find the bug. We also can´t reproduce the error. 

Do you have any ideas? 

Thanks and best regards,

Sandra

entry.title: Re: How to avoid FX distortions in production order varia...
entry.content: S/4HANA Public Cloud mitigates the FX distortion not by changing the transactional posting logic, but by capturing costs in multiple currencies at the point of entry (via the Material Ledger) and providing advanced analytical tools to report on that data in the currency that makes sense for the audience. This allows a single controlling area to effectively serve both corporate consolidation and local operational control needs

entry.title: Custom field of Custom portlet to be pre-populated with Employees Date of Birth
entry.content:
We have built a custom Object Definition, where one field is a Date Field.  We have likewise built the UI for it and presented it in the People Profile.  Within this portlet, we need the Date Field to present the Employee's Date of Birth.

We have attempted to use a Business Rule (MDF Scenario, Base Object=custom Object Definition, Purpose=Initialise) to Set this Date Field to "ID Verification.externalCode.Personal Information.Biographical Information.Date of Birth" 

However, when we attempt to add a new record in this custom portlet, the Date field is not pre-populated with the Employees Date of Birth.

As a Test, we tried setting the Business Rule to just display "Today()" in this Date field.  This was successful.

Questions: 
Where am i going wrong?
Is there another way to pre-populate the Date field within the Date of Birth without having to use a Business Rule?

entry.title: Re: How to Mass maintain long texts in SAP S4 HANA Public...
entry.content:
Yes, SAP S/4 HANA Public Cloud offers several solutions and APIs for mass updating long texts, memos and notes in various business objects, including real state contracts. the recommended approach is to use the available OData APIs or SAP Build Process Automation to achieve mass upload and update functionality for long text IDs and contract memos. 

API solutions for Mass Updating

OData APIs: SAP provides batch APIs that allow updating multiple long text in a single request. for example, the  MsrmDocumentLongText entity supports batch processing, where you can send multiple updates for long text field in one go using the multiple batch OData protocol.

Reference link: Link1

Reference link: Link2

entry.title: Re: SAP Public Cloud 2508 / Error when using the new App...
entry.content:
Hello @LukasKuhn

Thank you for clarifying. Let us go through the points you raised.

Even when you only activate editing in Excel, the program may silently alter the XML structure. I suggest testing wit a completely untouched XML file exported directly and uploaded back again. If the raw export fails again, then Excel did not cause the issue.

The import without source system option exist to support standalone imports. In practice, however, certain bugs have been reported where the app still expects a source system reference. If you want to rule this out, try defining a dummy source system in the communication management app and re-test. Import Master Data - Business Partners (New)

In regard to your file size, this can be excluded as not the problem. Also, considering you have tested with multiple browsers, this suggests to be a backend import job failing immediately and re-triggering.

I recommend to

  • Carry out the unmodified import and export.
  • If it still fails define the dummy source as mentioned and test without the checkbox.
  • Should the flickering persist in both cases, there is likely a bug in your tenant. You should raise an incident with SAP.

Best regards

Chris

entry.title: Re: Number Range Buffer - Why We Sometimes See Skips in The Number Range for Business Partners
entry.content:
@Jaimin_Jani 

As far as I can see it is the same behaviour in terms of buffering.

Please see SAP note https://me.sap.com/notes/0002706589

"The technical reason for shifted User ID is buffering of the number range. The buffer of the number range contains 10 numbers. But anyway the User ID is a random number locally on the specific system and not a User Name to rely on."

Is mise le meas

Brad

entry.title: Bad Request with HTTP Reciever Adapter with OAuth2 Client Credential
entry.content:
On SAP cloud integration I have configured an HTTP receiver adapter with OAuth2 client credentials and the appropriate security material. However, calling the API endpoint fails with a bad request error. The same call works with Postman/Bruno, though.
The authorization header with bearer **** can be seen in the request header log, but I believe the token is not present.
Attached is the configuration of the HTTP receiver adapter and the secret material.
A similar configuration works on the PI, but here the ClientId and Client Secret are not used to retrieve the token, but rather the Base64-encrypted token.
Are others experiencing similar problems, or is there a possible solution for this?

entry.title: Re: Journal Document upload Error
entry.content:
Hello @JackN11 

Thank you for your follow up question. Let me clarify.

See the following link for more details: Integration and Configuration Options. However, the default storage category is DMS-C1_ST for storing attachments. It is preconfigured in public cloud tenants and mapped to the DMS backend.

In regard to verifying your content repository in DMS, you can check this:

  • In your SAP BTP Cockpit, navigate to your subaccount where the cloud tenant is subscribed. Locate the DMS, under instances and subscriptions, you should see the configured repository bound to your tenant.
  • Within the public cloud, you can also test by opening the Manage Documents Fiori app à create/upload a document. If the repository is active, the document will be stored successfully. If missing then contact SAP support to activate it.

Best regards

Chris

entry.title: How to change the posting date of schedule supplier invoice job ERS?
entry.content:
Dear Community,

When we schedule supplier invoice job for ERS, the posting date is always the job running date, is there any settings to change this posting date?

Background; At the beginning of Sep., we found missing posting for some goods receipt, we posted the goods receipt, and change the posting date to Aug., and want to post the invoice in Aug. as well, to align the goods receipt and invoice postings in the same period.

Seems we cannot use "create supplier invoice" to manually create such kind of invoice, because in the PO and supplier master data, it has already set as ERS related.

Is there any solution for changing the posting date of invoice? 

Thank you.

Best Regards,

Grace

entry.title: Crystal Reports 2008: Cannot use linked parameter for subreport group sorting.
entry.content:
Component: BI-RA-CR (Business Intelligence - Reporting & Analysis - Crystal Reports)

Priority: High (business impact).

Description:

We are using a main report to execute a single stored procedure (Process_Info) for performance optimization. The goal is to avoid multiple database calls by having the main report retrieve all necessary data and then pass it to three different subreports. Each subreport requires its own unique sorting and grouping order.

We have attempted to implement this by linking data fields from the main report to each of the subreports. However, we have found a critical limitation: a parameter or field linked from the main report to a subreport is not available in the subreport's Group Expert for sorting.

Problem Replication:

  1. Create a main report and a sub report.

  2. Connect the main report to a SQL server stored procedure that returns a dataset.

  3. Create a parameter in the sub report that corresponds to a field from the main report's data source.

  4. In the main report, right-click the subreport and link a data field (e.g., Chrono_DT or Unit_Procedure) from the main report's data source to the parameter created in the subreport.

  5. Go to the subreport and open the Group Expert.

  6. The linked parameter is not available in the list of fields that can be used for grouping or sorting.

Business Impact:

This limitation forces us to either:

  1. Create separate database connections for each subreport, which results in multiple redundant database calls and significantly increases report execution time.

Request:

We need a definitive solution or a product fix that allows us to use a linked parameter or field from a main report to define the grouping and sorting order in a subreport. This is a critical requirement for maintaining report performance and an efficient report architecture. Please escalate this to the appropriate product management or development team for resolution.

Thanks In advance.

entry.title: Re: SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud 交货单&发票打印-自定义合作伙伴地址
entry.content:
Hello @Joey3 

感谢您的澄清。
更多详情请参阅《输出管理与3008187 - SAP S/4HANA云公共版采购订单输出管理》。
但简而言之，在公共云环境中无法像本地部署那样通过自定义交易伙伴功能增强交易伙伴确定机制。您仅能使用输出表单中预设的标准交易伙伴角色集，因此无法使用ZS第三方供应商选项。
在公共云环境中可考虑以下方案：
• 通过自定义字段与逻辑应用程序，或利用输出管理提供的BAdI扩展表单数据源。详见文档3008187 - SAP S/4HANA云公共版采购订单输出管理
• 在输出结构中获取数据后，可修改Adobe表单。添加ZS第三方供应商字段并将其绑定至增强数据。
若需避免BAdI编码，可将供应商地址存储于交货发票文档头部的自定义字段中。该字段可通过自定义字段应用程序→UI与报表→输出表单进行展示，确保数据直接流入表单而无需扩展合作伙伴功能。
此致
克里斯

Output Management & 3008187 - Purchase Order Output Management in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition

Translated using GenAi

entry.title: Purchase Request Decision Note CDS requirement
entry.content:
There is a CDS requirement that allows us to read the value written in the decision note field that appears after the rejection of purchase requests.

As CDS, we can display the values I_WorkflowTaskResult and I_WorkflowTaskResultComment, but these also appear to be disabled.

We kindly request your suggestions and support.


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: Re: Purchase Request Decision Note CDS requirement
entry.content:
Hi,

I am afraid the functionality is not available for purchase requisitions.
The documentation for email notifications for purchase requisitions is here: 
For purchase requisition approvals and rejections the data source C_WORKFLOWTASK is defined which does not include the 
rejection comments. The functionality is available for purchase orders where the data source C_PURORDWORKFLOWAPPROVALEMAIL is defined but not purchase requisitions. 

If you feel that the SAP S/4Hana public cloud customer base would benefit from an enhancement of these functionalities you can raise a feature request via http://influence.sap.com (See notes 2838428,  11 and 2963059 attached) 
These requests are reviewed by our product management and valid cases can be considered for the future product roadmap.

Currently the email templates are quite limited in the standard and they are using CDS views which can not be changed and enhanced. This is indeed causing the issue that custom variables are not passing any data to the email itself.

Best regards,

Krithika

entry.title: Re: Unable to deploy Function Library while Migrating fro...
entry.content:
Hi @NidhiSrivastava ,

I encountered the same error while deploying the function library artifact in CPI.

To resolve this, we need to ensure that the method arguments are of type array (e.g., int[ ]) if the method is a void method.

In my case, the issue was with the argument int max7102. I changed this argument to an integer array, int[ ] max7102, and that resolved the problem.

 

@FunctionLibraryMethod(category = "KA-ODETTE PAC", title = "CreateNCO", executionType = "ALL_VALUES_OF_CONTEXT", key = "calculate1222222222222222222")
    public void CreateNCO(@UDFParam(paramCategory = "Argument", title = "") String[] hlnum, @UDFParam(paramCategory = "Argument", title = "") String[] pckar, @UDFParam(paramCategory = "Argument", title = "") String[] anzar, @UDFParam(paramCategory = "Argument", title = "") String[] exidv, @UDFParam(paramCategory = "Argument", title = "") String[] venum, @UDFParam(paramCategory = "Argument", title = "") String[] zparent, @UDFParam(paramCategory = "Argument", title = "") String[] zpckar, @UDFParam(paramCategory = "Argument", title = "") String[] zanzar, @UDFParam(paramCategory = "Parameter", title = "Max 7102") int[] max7102, @UDFParam(paramCategory = "ResultList", title = "") ResultList result, Container container) throws StreamTransformationException {
       
  //Keeps track of last ANZAR
        String oldAnzar = "";
        //Keeps track of last PCKAR
        String oldPckar = "";
        int lastHlnum = 0;
        int ginCnt = 0;
        int zginCnt = 0;
        int max = max7102[0];
        //counter for boxes
        int zCnt = 0;
        //Indicator, is true only when we go through the first pallet or box
        boolean firstTime = true;
        String lastExidv = "";
        /*Loop through all E1EDP08 (Pallets) */
        for (int i = 0; i < hlnum.length; i++) {
            if (hlnum[i].equals("2")) {
                /*If Pallet has smallboxes on it*/
                /* Loop through all smallboxes on pallet */
                while (venum[i].equals(zparent[zCnt])) {
                    boolean firstTimeForPallet = true;
                    if (((!oldAnzar.equals(zanzar[zCnt]) || !oldPckar.equals(zpckar[zCnt])) && !firstTime) || lastHlnum == 1) {
                        /*If PCKAR or ANZAR has changed make context change to come in correct PAC segment */
                        result.addContextChange();
                        //<--- We want to reset zginCnt when pkcar or anzar changes
                        zginCnt = 0;
                    }
                    /*
								Problem in code if a pallet has 2 or more boxes with different zanzar or zpckar
								We will not create a NCO for the 2nd box since zginCnt will be 0
									
	
							## Code before Change ##
						if((zginCnt % max7102 == 0 && zginCnt > 0)  || !lastExidv.equals(exidv[i]))										
								{
														result.addValue(exidv[i]);
														zginCnt = 0;
								}

								Solution.
								Move in zginCnt so that it will only control if we should reset zginCnt or not.
						*/
                    if (zginCnt % max == 0 || !lastExidv.equals(exidv[i])) {
                        result.addValue(exidv[i]);
                        if (zginCnt > 0) {
                            zginCnt = 0;
                        }
                    }
                    firstTime = false;
                    oldPckar = zpckar[zCnt];
                    oldAnzar = zanzar[zCnt];
                    lastExidv = exidv[i];
                    lastHlnum = 2;
                    zCnt++;
                    zginCnt++;
                    if (zCnt >= zparent.length) {
                        break;
                    }
                }
            } else {
                //Stand alone box or Pallet
                if ((!oldAnzar.equals(anzar[i]) || !oldPckar.equals(pckar[i])) || lastHlnum == 2) {
                    if (!firstTime) {
                        /*If PCKAR or ANZAR has changed make context change to come in correct PAC segment */
                        result.addContextChange();
                    }
                    ginCnt = 0;
                    // don't need to put out master
                    result.addValue(exidv[i]);
                } else {
                    if (ginCnt % max == 0) {
                        // don't need to put out master
                        result.addValue(exidv[i]);
                    }
                }
                firstTime = false;
                oldPckar = pckar[i];
                oldAnzar = anzar[i];
                lastHlnum = 1;
                ginCnt++;
            }
            lastExidv = exidv[i];
        }
    }

Please check the arguments in all the methods of your function library to fix this error.
You may face the same issue with String, int, or Float arguments as well.

Regards,
Praveen

entry.title: The International 2025 – Review of TI14 with SAP & Team Liquid
entry.content:
The International 2025 – Review of TI14 with SAP & Team Liquid

From September 11 to 14, 2025, the Barclays Arena in Hamburg became the center of the esports world. The International 2025 (TI14), the most important Dota 2 tournament of the year, brought together the 16 best teams. In addition to the legendary Aegis of Champions, a total prize pool of $2,694,437 was up for grabs – funded by Valve's base pool plus community purchases in the Dota client.

Prize pool distribution (Top 4)

Team Falcons – approx. $1,181,757 (43.9% of the pool)
🥈Xtreme Gaming – approx. $305,163
🥉PARiVISION – approx. $192,000
4️⃣BetBoom Team – approx. $128,000
The remaining teams received smaller prize money depending on their ranking.


Viewership & Reach

Peak Viewers: 1.77 million concurrent viewers in the Grand Final.
📊Average Viewers: approximately 835,000 over the entire event.
🌍TI14 was broadcast in more than 20 languages worldwide.

This makes TI14 the third most popular Dota 2 event of all time, just behind TI10 and TI11.

Stadium at The International 2025Team LiquidStadiumPublic View on the Ongoing GamesPublic View on the Ongoing Games


SAP & Team Liquid – Data in Esports

SAP has been working with Team Liquid since 2018, bringing business technology to gaming:

SAP HANA analytics helped Liquid evaluate over 500,000 draft scenarios and better understand opponents' strategies.
Liquid used statistical models to calculate hero pick probabilities – similar to sales or demand forecasts in business.
Even though they didn't make it into the top 4 this year, Liquid was able to show several times during the tournament how data-driven strategies influence drafts and early-game decisions.


Tournament progress – facts and figures

16 teams started in the group stage, which was played using the Swiss system.
A total of 51 matches were played, with an average game duration of 42 minutes.
Longest game: 77 minutes in the lower bracket, a real thriller that tested the nerves of both players and fans.
Most picked hero: Shadow Demon (48 picks, 56% win rate).
Highest KDA (kills/deaths/assists): A Falcons player with 14.2 in the Grand Final.


Significance & outlook

TI14 proved that esports and technology are increasingly converging.
For SAP, the partnership with Team Liquid is a showcase for data-driven innovation.
For fans, Hamburg was a worthy venue with a spine-tingling atmosphere.
TI15 will take place in Shanghai in 2026 – a venue traditionally known for its vocal fans and gigantic arenas.

 

Conclusion

With over $2.6 million in prize money, nearly 2 million live viewers, and thrilling best-of-five series, TI14 was a worthy milestone in Dota 2 history.
Team Falcons will go down in history as the 2025 champions, while Team Liquid, with the help of SAP data analytics, proves that modern esports is not just about reaction time and instinct – but also big data and smart strategy.

entry.title: How to create a salesorder with i_salesordertp referring to a quotation?
entry.content:
Hi all,

I'm creating a salesorder with EML using i_salesordertp. But it seems I can't refer to a quotation in order to fill the documentflow for the sales order.

Filling the field ReferenceSDDocument itself gives the error "The field "REFERENCESDDOCUMENT" of entity "I_SALESORDERTP" cannot be modified"

And the following example code:

    MODIFY ENTITIES OF i_salesordertp
     ENTITY salesorder
     EXECUTE createwithreference
     FIELDS ( salesdocumenttype
     referencesddocument )

     WITH VALUE #( ( %cid = 'H001'
     %param = VALUE #( salesdocumenttype = 'TA'
     referencesddocument = '0020000011' ) ) )
     MAPPED DATA(ls_mapped)
     FAILED DATA(ls_failed)
     REPORTED DATA(ls_reported).

gives the error "The entity "I_SALESORDERTP" does not have an action "CREATEWITHREFERENCE"".

Can anyone give me a hint on how to use a quotation as reference in i_salesordertp?

Thanks in advance.

SAP Future Talent: Get started with SAP Ariba

Este treinamento é organizado pela equipe do SAP Future Talent, e estamos felizes em compartilhar essa oportunidade com a nossa comunidade!

Sobre o treinamento:

Participe do treinamento Get started with SAP Ariba, uma capacitação gratuita e online destinada a estudantes, iniciantes em soluções SAP e profissionais em transição de carreira que desejam se aprofundar nos conceitos de compras e supply chain.

O programa apresentará os principais recursos e funcionalidades do SAP Ariba, além de exemplos de integração com outros sistemas SAP e boas práticas de utilização.

entry.title: system change the plant address automatically in a customer address
entry.content:
Hello all,

I have this phenomenon in our SAP S4 HANA system (no retail):


The system change the plant address automatically in a customer address. This came after one year of go-live. One year the plant was correct - without automatically changes. 


If we correct the plant address via OX10 and transport it to our production system, the plant address will be automatically overwritten (every two/three weeks) from transaction VL09 or VL02N (we saw it on the database).
But we don´t find the reason why the system change it automatically. Important to know, this is a trade process. 

Its only for 2 plants - not for all plants. We checked batch jobs, customer-programms, check user behavior and so on.
No solution to find the bug. We also can´t reproduce the error.


Actual we check BAPI_ADDRESSORG_SAVEREPLICA.

Do you have any ideas what is ?


Thanks and best regards,
Sandra

entry.title: Re: Universal OData ↔ MCP Bridge; Or: How I Accidentally Made 15,000 Enterprise Services Talk to AI
entry.content: @bjorn-henrik_zink if you are not mass-extracting data via MCP-OData bridge - you are fine, same for the training. The MCP-OData bridge has nothing to do with training - so no issues there (unless you are explicitly using it for such case).

entry.title: Re: VAT Only Invoice GL Account and Manual Posting
entry.content:
The reason why you were not able to clear the VAT invoice is because, VAT‑only AP invoice posting (via FB60/FB01 with tax code) works because the system posts Vendor line and VAT line (to your new VAT G/L account 1440303). Clearing issue arises because I believe, your VAT G/L account is not flagged as open item managed in FS00. Without open item management, you cannot “clear” individual postings against each other. The account is behaving like a pure P&L/Balance Sheet account, not like a subledger clearing account.

In standard SAP, VAT accounts are not cleared manually. They are periodically reconciled and reported (via tax reports, e.g. RFUMSV00 or DRC in S/4HANA). Payment of VAT to the tax authority is posted separately (Bank → VAT payable), not by “clearing” the VAT G/L.

The standard design is VAT G/L accounts are configured in OB40. When you post an invoice with tax, the system automatically posts to the correct VAT account. When you pay VAT to the tax authority, you post a manual journal entry (Bank → VAT payable). You do not clear the VAT G/L line items; instead, you reconcile via tax reporting.

In the SAP there are 2 T-code available here are as follows

1) FS00 - display G/L Account

entry.title: Re: Story Changes Lost in Edit Mode Due to Active Bookmark in SAP Analytics Cloud
entry.content: Hello, I would like to share an observation regarding the feedback mechanism available in the SAC browser. While it is useful for sharing inputs, I feel this channel does not provide the same level of commitment or tracking that a formal support ticket offers. This creates uncertainty, as there is no visibility on whether the feedback will be reviewed, prioritized, or resolved. To illustrate, I recently encountered an issue with Bookmarks: Formatting changes (text color, font size, layout, etc.) are saved correctly. But when the story is opened in View Mode, a Bookmark seems to be auto-applied, reverting the story to an earlier state. Even in Edit Mode, the story reflects this Bookmark state, and if saved again, the changes appear lost. This is confusing for users who are not aware that a Bookmark is being applied automatically. Workaround: For now, I have disabled Bookmarks to avoid these issues. However, this means the whole concept and benefit of using Bookmarks is lost in my case. In my view, a more structured mechanism is needed. Developers without S-User access cannot raise tickets directly, and feedback submissions do not allow us to track progress or receive commitments on resolution. Has anyone else in the community faced similar challenges, and how are you addressing them? Thank you.

entry.title: Re: Transfer of Planned independent Requirement from head...
entry.content: Have you completed a full cycle test yet including Sales Order Invoicing and posting a Delivery PGI yet? That will tell you where the costs will flow and if there is a problem with having the stock under the grouping WBS. The revenue will post to the WBs assigned in the Sales Order.
